text: 2:3 Jon 17:12; 1 Timoti 4:1; 1 Jon 2:18; 4:3; Akar Mogomem 13:11-14Ia gumazitamɨn gantɨ a uan akatam o arazir an amitamɨn ia gifaran markɨ. Ia oragh! Dughiar kam puram otoghan kogham. Puvatɨ. Faraghɨvɨra gumazir avɨrim Godɨn akaba batoghɨva akɨrim ragh God gasaragham. Eghtɨ Godɨn Araziba adoghodozir gumazir mam azenara otogham, gumazir kam God helɨn a gasɨghasɨgham.
